title: $GOARCH not defined
body:
by **Ola.Jirlow**: 
.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Try to make go: $ ./all.bash
2.get error: $GOARCH is set to <>, must be amd64, 386, or arm
3.check $GOARCH: $ echo $GOARCH
386

4. ?

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
I expect go to build instead it says env $GOARCH is undefined when it's
obviously not.


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

linux, 386

Which revision are you sync'ed to?  (hg log -l 1)
changeset:   4152:27d09182bd5a
tag:         tip
user:        Rob Pike <r@golang.org>
date:        Thu Nov 19 11:51:23 2009 -0800
summary:     os.ReadAt doesn't return EOF at EOF.


Please provide any additional information below.
